Action.author: vijaypunugubati
Action.body: Please check this link https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-13075Â for the above issue number-1.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: That 13075 is an epic, currently set to v2.0, to upgrade node to version 10 and to remove dependency on x509 library. That will not be fixed now in 1.4, so... is this a true failure that will block v1.4 release? Do we need to open a BUG in v1.4 for this, or is there some other workaround?
